entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:58 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 01:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -26.2°C
Wind: E 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing early this evening. Wind becoming east 50 km/h gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 March 2023
